what: Simulation-Based Framework to Detect Animal–Vessel Interactions
title: Simulation-Based Framework to Detect Animal–Vessel Interactions
text: intersimR provides tools detect quantify local interaction events marine animals vessels using tracking data. package implements simulation-based framework described simulation-based framework detect marine animal–vessel interactions using tracking data, allowing users evaluate attraction following behaviour null-model simulations event-level metrics. package designed support reproducible analysis pipelines, making easy apply framework new datasets across marine species vessel types.

title: Simulation-Based Framework to Detect Animal–Vessel Interactions
text: intersimR includes tools : Extracting local interaction events animal vessel tracks Generating simulation-based null models Computing attraction following behaviour Estimating p-values based repeated simulations Summarising visualising interaction events workflow mirrors structure original methodological paper, generic functions can applied time-synchronised animal–vessel tracking dataset.
